head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KEEGAN, FRANCES L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KEEGAN, FRANCES L.

block.p: KEEGAN-Frances L. September 12th, 1998. Beloved mother of Frances A. Keegan, Edward A. Keegan and Roxanne K. Bethany. Vistors may call at McMahon Lyon Hartnett Funeral Home, 491 Mamaroneck Ave., White Plains, New York, Tuesday, September 15, 2:00-4:00, 7:00-9:00 PM. Funeral mass 10:00 AM, Wednesday, September 16, St. Bernard's Church, Prospect Street and S. Lexington Avenue White Plains. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to: Covenant House 346 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 or Graymoor Sponsors, Box 731 Garrison, New York 10524.
